thread.title: Lashekia
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Lashekia

author: Lashekia
title: Lashekia
text: Every clean place. They have very nice furniture at a affordable price. If you need financing they have serval options for you. The guys working their are awesome as well as the manager. Floyd was my sale and gave me 5 star service the whole time! Mr. Larry the manager was even nice. They definitely made me and my husband feel valuable and we will be back for purchases.
